# Source: https://www.anthropic.com/webinars/claude-code-live

---

# Claude Code Live: Origin story, live demos, & best practices

Join the creators of Claude Code for a behind-the-scenes look at Anthropic's first AI agent. In this technical session, you'll hear directly from the creators of Claude Code about its development journey and the challenges overcome. We’ll also dive into demos of Claude Code in action, showcasing best practices for bringing Claude Code into existing workflows and how to use it in real codebases.

## Featuring

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ed58c92cfedc451ebbbca1/682420637566e243aa62dbe7_cat-wu.webp)

### Cat Wu

Product Manager at Anthropic

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ed58c92cfedc451ebbbca1/68242073ba5cbaf37d851202_boris-cherny.webp)

### Boris Cherny

Head of Claude Code @ Anthropic

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ed58c92cfedc451ebbbca1/6824215031519c9651515167_cal-rueb.webp)

### Cal Rueb

Member of Technical Staff at Anthropic

## What you’ll learn

* The origin story and development process behind Claude Code
* Best practices for integrating Claude Code into existing development workflows
* Live demonstration showing Claude Code working with real-world codebases
